long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Our extension allows you to block URLs, but with a unique twist: removing a blocked URL requires manual work. To remove a site, you must type out characters, making it harder to unblock websites impulsively.

Key Features:
- Add URLs to your blocklist. When you try to revisit that URL it will be blocked.
- Removing URLs by typing out a set number of characters, discouraging easy unblocking.
- The characters you type can be any character keys on your keyboard including letters, numbers, and special characters. The number of characters you have remaining to type out will be displayed at the bottom of the text input with the red outline.
- Ideal for users who need an extra layer of discipline while online.

Stay focused, stay productive, and block distractions.
